pullrequest.title: Fix entity tree context menu position

content.raw:
This is not working for nested items because `styleData.index.row` returns the nested row, not the global one.

This worked better for me:

```.diff
diff -r 1df46fcbe23e src/gui/plugins/entity_tree/EntityTree.qml
--- a/src/gui/plugins/entity_tree/EntityTree.qml        Fri Mar 20 16:02:03 2020 -0700
+++ b/src/gui/plugins/entity_tree/EntityTree.qml        Fri Mar 20 17:34:58 2020 -0700
@@ -205,8 +205,8 @@
             if (mouse.button == Qt.RightButton) {
               var type = EntityTreeModel.EntityType(styleData.index)
               var scopedName = EntityTreeModel.ScopedName(styleData.index)
-              entityContextMenu.open(scopedName, type, parent.x + ma.mouseX,
-                  styleData.index.row * itemHeight + ma.mouseY)
+              var posInTree = mapToItem(entityTree, ma.mouseX, ma.mouseY)
+              entityContextMenu.open(scopedName, type, posInTree.x, posInTree.y)
               // Prevent plugin's context menu from opening
               mouse.accepted = true
             }
```
